Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider.MetaDataProvider

  • Packages that use MetaDataProvider 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata
    Implementations of the Bean Validation metadata interfaces as well as Hibernate Validator specific meta data classes.
    org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider
    Abstraction of the meta data sources - annotation, xml, programmatic

    • Uses of MetaDataProvider in org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata

      Constructor parameters in org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata with type arguments of type MetaDataProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      BeanMetaDataManager(ConstraintHelper constraintHelper, ExecutableHelper executableHelper, ParameterNameProvider parameterNameProvider, List<MetaDataProvider> optionalMetaDataProviders)
      Creates a new BeanMetaDataManager.

    • Uses of MetaDataProvider in org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider

      Classes in org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider that implement MetaDataProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotationMetaDataProvider
      MetaDataProvider which reads the metadata from annotations which is the default configuration source.
      class  MetaDataProviderKeyedByClassName
      Base implementation for MetaDataProviders which cache the BeanConfiguration by class name.
      class  ProgrammaticMetaDataProvider
      A MetaDataProvider based on the programmatic constraint API.
      class  TypeAnnotationAwareMetaDataProvider
      Extends AnnotationMetaDataProvider by discovering and registering constraints defined via Java 8 type annotations.
      class  XmlMetaDataProvider
      A MetaDataProvider providing constraint related meta data based on XML descriptors as defined by the Bean Validation API.
